tagline: Architects Stripe payment systems — subscriptions, Connect, webhooks, and billing logic built for production.
pros: Deep Stripe API expertise across Payments, Subscriptions, and Connect
Rigorous about idempotency, webhook handling, and failure paths
Handles complex billing: metered usage, seat-based, marketplace splits

cons: Stripe-specific — less useful for PayPal, Braintree, or custom payment work
